name: Postal Services: Government Only
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Government postal offices, including local post office branches.
Services provided include accepting and processing packages and
mail for delivery, selling postage stamps, and express mailing
services.
For mail packaging stores that provide packaging services and sell
stamps, greeting cards, and wrapping, and that may also provide
services for UPS, Federal Express, and other express mail services,
use MCC 7399.
